mapper.select: SELECT sc.id, sc.score, sc.course_id, c.name AS course_name, c.course_code FROM scau_student_course sc JOIN scau_course c ON sc.course_id = c.id WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId}
SELECT id FROM scau_student_course WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
SELECT id FROM scau_student_course WHERE course_id = #{courseId} AND student_id = #{studentId}
